set.name: DMR-16極 Super Battle Guynext x Goku

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, put a fire dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) Dragon Mana Arms 5: When this creature attacks for the first time in a turn, if you have 5 or more fire Dragons in your mana zone, untap it after the attack. Double breaker

card.name: Welcome Hell, Supreme Devil King Palace

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this dragheart into the battle zone or whenever one of your Draguners attacks, you may put a darkness creature that costs 5 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, you may destroy 4 of your creatures. If you do, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker When this creature is Dragsolutioned, destroy up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then put a non-evolution creature from your graveyard into the battle zone. Dragon Evade—When this creature would leave the battle zone, flip it to the dragheart fortress side instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} At the start of your opponent's turn, choose one of his creatures that can attack. That creature must attack that turn if able. Double breaker Mana Arms 7: When this creature would leave the battle zone, if you have 7 or more Darkness cards in your mana zone, you may put 5 cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multicolored Mana Arms 5: If you have this card in your hand and 5 or more civilizations and cards in your mana zone, this creature gets 'Super Strike Back'. (When a card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, summon this creature for no cost.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into it's owners mana zone. Your opponent's draghearts can't dragsolution. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your spells may each cost 1 less to cast. They can't cost less than 1. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if you cast 3 or more spells, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If it leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone by the effect of a spell, he can't choose this one. Whenever you cast a spell, you may cast a spell that costs less than that spell from your graveyard. If you do, put that spell on the bottom of your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. Whenever this creature attacks, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature in the battle zone gets 'slayer'. (Whenever a creature that has 'slayer' battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have 'blocker'. Speed attacker Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution cards that costs 5 or less in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this fortress into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. Hyperspatial Dragheart Fortress

alternate.name: All Over The World, Supreme True Dragon Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is dragsolutioned, each player puts all cards in his hand, battle zone and graveyard other than this creature into their owners decks and shuffles it. Speed attacker World breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, if it's tapped, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more water cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution cards that costs 5 or less in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your graveyard for no cost. After you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 3 or less or a darkness dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures gets -2000 power. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a card name. Then reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add all cards that have that same name into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution cards that costs 5 or less in the battle zone and put it into its owner's graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this fortress into the battle zone, one of your creatures gets 'speed attacker' until the end of the turn. Super Dragsolution—If you have Whitey, Dragon Soul Church, Bluenika, Dragon Soul Fortress, Blacko, Dragon Soul Palace, Reddull, Dragon Soul Castle and Greene, Dragon Soul Ruins in the battle zone, flip each card one by one to the dragheart creature side untapped.

alternate.name: All Over The World, Supreme True Dragon Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is dragsolutioned, each player puts all cards in his hand, battle zone and graveyard other than this creature into their owners decks and shuffles it. Speed attacker World breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, if it's tapped, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero-If you have 3 or more Dragons in the battle zone, you may cast this spell for no cost. Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. Whenever one of your creatures is blocked this turn, untap that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your nature creatures. Double breaker Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When this creature is put into your hand from your shields, if you have 5 or more nature cards in your mana zone, this creature gets {SHIELD TRIGGER}. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution cards in the battle zone that costs 5 or less and put it into it's owner mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this dragheart fortress into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If it leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.value: Whenever you put a creature that has 'Guerrilla Division' in its name in the battle zone, you may draw a card.

Rules

card.name: Metal Avenger Revenge, Nu Dragon Edge

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 3 or less or a water dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the ability of one of your opponent's creatures or spells, you may put it into the battle zone instead. When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all creatures that have no abilities from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you don't have 5 or more creatures in your graveyard, this creature can't attack.

property.value: Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -6000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)
